answers.answer: 25 weeks 5 days to be on point. Please any input I'm kinda scared now that I looked at Google
I'm not sure what your feet smelling sweet has anything to do with your glucose test.?!  I think everything will be okay until your next test..
It's a sign of diabetes..... Well as far as Google sd. My mom, RN said not to worry and tht my next glucose test is only 2 weeks away but she reassured me a little

question: I'm 25 sms and had a one hour sugar test at 20 weeks because diabetes runs in my family. It came back fine. Iam supposed to have one at 28 weeks as well. Should I let my Dr know now or wait the three weeks for my second test?
title: my feet smell sweet???
